EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.Invite Partner and Speaker Dinner
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us for Tricentis Partner & Speaker Dinner
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We would like to invite you to join us at our Partner & Speaker Dinner on October 21st, 2015 at 6:30 pm in the bar of the Novomatic Forum.
Novomatic Forum - Bar (1st Floor) Friedrichstrasse 7 1010 Vienna Austria
We are planning for an enjoyable evening of great food, conversation, and networking.
{{my.Partner & Speaker Dinner:default=edit me}}, and we look forward to your joining us in Vienna.
Best regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
